description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Burritos recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burrito,Microwave,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Chicken,Jan Feb 2020,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chicken Burritos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g no added salt black beans, rinsed (drained)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chicken, spices and oil in a bowl. Cook chicken in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat for 8 minutes, turning often, or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a clean bowl to cool.

Add beans, corn, rice and coriander to chicken and stir to combine. Warm tortillas in microwave as per packet instructions. Place one on a board and top with 1/6 cup chicken mixture, 1/4 cup cheese, and some of the onion and capsicum strips. Fold in sides of burrito and roll up to enclose. Repeat with remaining ingredients.

To freeze, wrap tightly in foil, label and freeze. Thaw overnight in fridge before cooking. To heat frozen burritos, remove foil and wrap loosely in damp paper towel. Microwave for 2-3 minutes or until heated through.
